description: Number of asymmetric forests with n nodes.
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, p. 301 and 562.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..800
Index entries for sequences related to trees
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(binomial(b((i-1)$2), j)*b(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:g:= n-> b((n-1)$2):h:= proc(n) option remember; g(n)-add(g(i)*g(n-i), i=0..n)/2       -`if`(irem(n, 2)=1, 0, g(n/2))/2    end:f:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(binomial(h(i), j)*f(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:a:= n-> f(n, n):seq(a(n), n=0..40);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 20 2013
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n==0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[Binomial[b[i-1, i-1], j]*b[n-i*j, i-1], {j, 0, n/i}]]]; g[n_] := b[n-1, n-1]; h[n_] := h[n] = g[n] - Sum[g[i]*g[n-i], {i, 0, n}]/2 - If[Mod[n, 2]==1, 0, g[n/2]]/2; f[n_, i_] := f[n, i] = If[n==0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[Binomial[h[i], j]*f[n - i*j, i-1], {j, 0, n/i}]]]; a[n_] := f[n, n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 40}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Feb 21 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Oct 15 1998
